name: DMMod
savepath: Hello, been a while! I haven't abandoned the mod, it's just been kinda slow going and a busy year. I'll likely be very busy from this point onwards so I wouldn't expect another patch for quite a while again. Thanks for checking out my mod.

Some base item buffs like falchions, a few of the dagger types, throwing potions, etc. Lots of normal unique armor/weapon buffs (exceptional/elite will be in future patches), some monster stat corrections, a few minor skill changes and bug fixes.
